name: Godzilla: Kaiju Daikessen
overview: A 2D fighter featuring famous Toho Kaiju monsters. Like Godzilla, Mohtra, King Ghidorah and others. While the game was released in Japan only, a US version was in production at one point under the working title Godzilla: Destroy All Monsters but cancelled before release. It is the sequel to the 1993 TurboGrafx-CD Godzilla fighter Godzilla: Battle Legends, also developed by Alfa System.
